name: v5 package.json
code:
{
  "name": "my-feathers-app",
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "description": "",
  "main": "src/index.ts",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "nodemon -x ts-node src/index.ts",
    "compile": "shx rm -rf lib/ && tsc",
    "start": "node lib/",
    "mocha": "cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha test/ --recursive --exit --timeout 10000",
    "test": "npm run mocha"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@feathersjs/feathers": "^5.0.0",
    "@feathersjs/express": "^5.0.0",
    "@feathersjs/socketio": "^5.0.0",
    "@feathersjs/configuration": "^5.0.0",
    "@feathersjs/authentication": "^5.0.0",
    "@feathersjs/authentication-local": "^5.0.0",
    "@feathersjs/authentication-oauth": "^5.0.0",
    "@feathersjs/schema": "^5.0.0",
    "@feathersjs/typebox": "^5.0.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "typescript": "^5.0.0",
    "ts-node": "^10.9.0",
    "nodemon": "^3.0.0"
  }
}

name: v5 app.ts
v5 index.ts
v4 package.json
code:
{
  "name": "my-feathers-app",
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "description": "My Feathers v4 application",
  "main": "src",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "npm run lint && npm run mocha",
    "lint": "eslint src/. test/. --config .eslintrc.json",
    "dev": "nodemon src/",
    "start": "node src/",
    "mocha": "mocha test/ --recursive --exit --timeout 10000"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@feathersjs/configuration": "^4.5.0",
    "@feathersjs/errors": "^4.5.0",
    "@feathersjs/express": "^4.5.0",
    "@feathersjs/feathers": "^4.5.0",
    "@feathersjs/socketio": "^4.5.0",
    "@feathersjs/authentication": "^4.5.0",
    "@feathersjs/authentication-local": "^4.5.0",
    "@feathersjs/authentication-oauth": "^4.5.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "eslint": "^7.0.0",
    "mocha": "^9.0.0",
    "nodemon": "^2.0.0"
  }
}

name: v4 app.js
